snippet: Hari Kunzru's fourth novel, "Gods Without Men," follows several characters over a vast span of time and their relationship to a rock formation in the Mojave Desert.
abstract: Hari Kunzru's fourth novel, "Gods Without Men," follows several characters over a vast span of time and their relationship to a rock formation in the Mojave Desert.

headline.main: Book Review Podcast: Hari Kunzru's Searchers in the Desert
